body_html:
I don't have an end-to-end working C example yet since I'm working with a binding instead of the C API directly,
but

  1. if you populate a graph with the content of the serialized metagraph https://storage.googleapis.com/malmaud-stuff/graph.pb and then
  2. use TF_GraphImportGraphDefWithReturnOutputs on the graph from the metagraph https://storage.googleapis.com/malmaud-stuff/graph_import.pb , remapping "x:0" to the tensor from the first graph named "out:0"

that triggers the error. If instead if you load those metagraphs into Python and use Python's TensorFlow.import_graph_def with the same remapping, it works. So this is unique to the C++ implementation of graph importing.
body_text:
I don't have an end-to-end working C example yet since I'm working with a binding instead of the C API directly,
but

if you populate a graph with the content of the serialized metagraph https://storage.googleapis.com/malmaud-stuff/graph.pb and then
use TF_GraphImportGraphDefWithReturnOutputs on the graph from the metagraph https://storage.googleapis.com/malmaud-stuff/graph_import.pb , remapping "x:0"  to the tensor from the first graph named "out:0"

that triggers the error. If instead if you load those metagraphs into Python and use Python's TensorFlow.import_graph_def with the same remapping, it works. So this is unique to the C++ implementation of graph importing.
body:
I don't have an end-to-end working C example yet since I'm working with a binding instead of the C API directly,
but 

1) if you populate a graph with the content of the serialized metagraph https://storage.googleapis.com/malmaud-stuff/graph.pb and then 
2) use `TF_GraphImportGraphDefWithReturnOutputs` on the graph from the metagraph https://storage.googleapis.com/malmaud-stuff/graph_import.pb , remapping "x:0"  to the tensor from the first graph named "out:0"

that triggers the error. If instead if you load those metagraphs into Python and use Python's `TensorFlow.import_graph_def` with the same remapping, it works. So this is unique to the C++ implementation of graph importing.
